channel.title: @MechQuest
channel.description: These.. ads. These damn ads cause anything related to java to slow down like fuck. I logged into RS for no apparent reason, hit the "Show new replies to your posts." button and a MechQuest ad shows. As soon as it starts playing the game basically froze. RS, this low-tech game froze. That's insane. Is there like, anyway to just remove them? I can't see how it relates to anything on this site anyways.

item.title: @MechQuest
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=‚ÄúNiall, post:16, topic:180355‚Äù][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=241648.msg2050256#msg2050256 date=1202881202]

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1865

There you are, have fun.

Do you still get the impressions when they use adblocker?

I don‚Äôt think so, but I use adblock and expect anyone else who wants to uses it as well. It doesn‚Äôt bother me as a website owner one bit.

I just thought you would because adblocker still has to request the page and then parse it before it can ‚Äòremove‚Äô the ad.

An impression isn‚Äôt calculated unless the javascript is ran though, and I don‚Äôt think adblock allows the javascript to run.
[/quote]

No, definitely not.

If it does allow the javascript to run, NoScript + AdBlock = hell for ads.[/quote]

Lol, I can still see it going both ways though. Whether from the website owner or from the sponsor itself, it is going to piss someone off. I guess ads always make two people happy and the third pissed off.

Read full topic

No, definitely not.

If it does allow the javascript to run, NoScript + AdBlock = hell for ads.

item.title: @MechQuest
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

[quote=‚Äúexe626, post:10, topic:180355‚Äù][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=241648.msg2046555#msg2046555 date=1202729471]

addons.mozilla.org

Adblock Plus ‚Äì Get this Extension for ü¶ä Firefox (en-US)

Download Adblock Plus for Firefox. Blocks annoying video ads on YouTube, Facebook ads, banners and much more. Adblock Plus blocks all annoying ads, and supports websites by not blocking unobtrusive ads by default (configurable).

There you are, have fun.
[/quote]I appreciate this very much. Thanks.[/quote]
Mmm. Are you serious?
lulz, Ad Block is like the best known FireFox Add-on.
Just not catching up?

Read full topic
